other_tests.findings: Bibasilar atelectasis, old right healed rib fractures, mild intrahepatic biliary duct dilatation, distended gallbladder without evidence of cholecystitis, normal pancreas, spleen, adrenal glands, and kidneys, no retroperitoneal or mesenteric lymphadenopathy, mild atherosclerotic calcifications at the abdominal aorta and iliac arteries, no free air and no free fluid, a large hiatal hernia, normal stomach, small and large bowel, dilated appendix measuring 9.5 cm with mild wall thickening and hyperenhancement, no significant periappendiceal stranding, no pelvic lymphadenopathy, no free fluid in pelvis, normal urinary bladder and uterus.
